Line Item description (company language): Advertising revenue consists of selling advertising placements on our family of apps to marketers, enabling them to reach people across various marketing objectives. Ads can appear on Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, and third-party applications and websites, and marketers pay based on impressions delivered or actions taken by users.

Reality Labs revenue is generated from the delivery of consumer hardware products, such as Meta Quest and Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses, and related software and content, including virtual, augmented, and mixed reality related consumer hardware, software, and content.

Compute revenue consists of Data Center accelerated computing platforms and AI solutions and software, networking, automotive platforms and autonomous and electric vehicle solutions, Jetson for robotics and other embedded platforms, and DGX Cloud computing services.
Networking revenue includes products and solutions related to networking within the Compute & Networking segment, such as Ethernet for AI and the Spectrum-X end-to-end ethernet platform.
Gaming revenue within the Graphics segment includes GeForce GPUs for gaming and PCs, the GeForce NOW game streaming service and related infrastructure, and solutions for gaming platforms.
